law.catch_line: Unlawful act of examiner not grounds to revoke license of employer -- Exception.
law.text: Any unlawful act or violation of any of the provisions of this chapter, upon the part of any examiner or trainee shall not be cause for revocation of the license of any other examiner for whom the offending examiner may have been employed, unless it shall appear to the satisfaction of the cabinet that the examiner has willfully aided or abetted the actions or activities of the offending examiner or trainee.
